p: The content and types of flavonoids are one of the most important ingredients in plants for controlling stress tolerance [ 46], and these are increased under stress [ 20]. Therefore, flavonoids play an important role in control of plant stress types due to their antioxidant properties and their specific structure. In fact, strawberries treated with 750 ppm ACEOs showed significantly higher amounts of TFC compared to other groups at the end of the storage period.
